ease.title: SIMPLE TO APPLY
ease.content: There are set interface information materials for the effective promotion of your page. Registration and configuring parameters will take only a few minutes.

live.title: LIVE AUIDIENCE
live.content: Our service doesn't collect any bots or offers; it gives you a chance to gather a 100% live audience. Take advantage of this opportunity!

mobile.title: EVEN ON THE MOBILES
mobile.content: Our service works on the tablets and various individual devices that are able to open other sites; it can even be used on mobile devices.

speed.title: FANTASTIC SPEED
speed.content: With the help of our service, you can involve 1000 people to your Instagram page per day from any parts of the world. It is very simple with us!

support.title: 24 HOURS OF CUSTOMER SUPPORT
support.content: We are always ready to answer all of your questions and to solve the problems occurred while working with the service; so we make it up for the lost days.

secure.title: WE PROVIDE YOU WITH TOTAL SECURITY
secure.content: The service operates in accordance with all the known limits and rules of Instagram. Your personal information is kept confidential and not transmitted elsewhere.
